overview: In Google Maps, the existing static scenes form a movie narrative through the movement of mirrors and editing language. Taking the original film as the plot prototype, the plot is reinterpreted with the technical landscape and materials of 2021. The footage is composed of public perspectives, from the real corner of the world to connect the scene of a car accident death that a woman witnessed as a child and search for the man she fell in love with, until she finally discovers the truth of what she witnessed.
title: La Jetée 2021
